00011 #include <vector>
00012 #include "mng.h"
00013 #include "../common/utils.h"

00024 
00025 
00029 template <typename block_type>
00030 class buffered_writer
00031 {
00032         buffered_writer() {}
00033 protected:
00034         typedef typename block_type::bid_type bid_type;
00035         
00036         const unsigned int nwriteblocks;
00037         block_type *write_buffers;
00038         bid_type * write_bids;
00039         request_ptr * write_reqs;
00040         const unsigned writebatchsize;
00041 
00042         std::vector<int> free_write_blocks;     // contains free write blocks
00043         std::vector<int> busy_write_blocks;     // blocks that are in writing, notice that if block is not in free_
00044                                                                                                                                                         // an not in busy then block is not yet filled
00045 
00046         struct batch_entry
00047         {
00048                 off_t offset;
00049                 int ibuffer;
00050                 batch_entry (off_t o, int b):offset (o), ibuffer (b) {};
00051         };
00052         struct batch_entry_cmp
00053         {
00054                 bool operator () (const batch_entry & a, const batch_entry & b) const
00055                 {
00056                         return (a.offset > b.offset);
00057                 };
00058         };
00059 
00060         typedef std::priority_queue < batch_entry, std::vector < batch_entry >, batch_entry_cmp > batch_type;
00061         batch_type batch_write_blocks;  // sorted sequence of blocks to write
00062         
00063 public:
00068         buffered_writer(unsigned write_buf_size, unsigned write_batch_size):
00069                 nwriteblocks ((write_buf_size > 2) ? write_buf_size : 2),
00070                 writebatchsize(write_batch_size ? write_batch_size : 1)
00071         {
00072                 write_buffers = new block_type[nwriteblocks];
00073                 write_reqs = new request_ptr[nwriteblocks];
00074                 write_bids = new bid_type[nwriteblocks];
00075 
00076                 for (unsigned i = 0; i < nwriteblocks; i++)
00077                         free_write_blocks.push_back (i);
00078                 
00079                 disk_queues::get_instance()->set_priority_op(disk_queue::WRITE);
00080         }
00083         block_type * get_free_block ()
00084         {
00085                 int ibuffer;
00086                 for (std::vector<int>::iterator it = busy_write_blocks.begin ();
00087                      it != busy_write_blocks.end (); it++)
00088                 {
00089                         if (write_reqs[ibuffer = (*it)]->poll())
00090                         {
00091                                 busy_write_blocks.erase (it);
00092                                 free_write_blocks.push_back (ibuffer);
00093 
00094                                 break;
00095                         }
00096                 }
00097                 if (UNLIKELY (free_write_blocks.empty ()))
00098                 {
00099                         int size = busy_write_blocks.size ();
00100                         request_ptr * reqs = new request_ptr[size];
00101                         int i = 0;
00102                         for (; i < size; i++)
00103                         {
00104                                 reqs[i] = write_reqs[busy_write_blocks[i]];
00105                         }
00106                         int completed = wait_any(reqs, size);
00107                         int completed_global = busy_write_blocks[completed];
00108                         delete [] reqs;
00109                         busy_write_blocks.erase (busy_write_blocks.begin () + completed);
00110 
00111                         return (write_buffers + completed_global);
00112                 }
00113                 ibuffer = free_write_blocks.back();
00114                 free_write_blocks.pop_back();
00115 
00116                 return (write_buffers + ibuffer);
00117         }
00123         block_type * write (block_type * filled_block, const bid_type & bid)    // writes filled_block and returns a new block 
00124         {
00125                 if(batch_write_blocks.size () >= writebatchsize)
00126                 {
00127                         // flush batch
00128                         while (!batch_write_blocks.empty ())
00129                         {
00130                                 int ibuffer = batch_write_blocks.top ().ibuffer;
00131                                 batch_write_blocks.pop ();
00132 
00133                                 write_reqs[ibuffer] = write_buffers[ibuffer].write (write_bids[ibuffer]);
00134 
00135                                 busy_write_blocks.push_back(ibuffer);
00136                         }
00137 
00138                 }
00139                 //    STXXL_MSG("Adding write request to batch")
00140                 
00141                 int ibuffer = filled_block - write_buffers;
00142                 write_bids[ibuffer] = bid;
00143                 batch_write_blocks.push(batch_entry(bid.offset,ibuffer));
00144 
00145                 return get_free_block (); 
00146         }
00148         void flush()
00149         {
00150                 int ibuffer;
00151                 while (!batch_write_blocks.empty ())
00152                 {
00153                         ibuffer = batch_write_blocks.top ().ibuffer;
00154                         batch_write_blocks.pop();
00155 
00156                         write_reqs[ibuffer] = write_buffers[ibuffer].write(write_bids[ibuffer]);
00157                         
00158                         busy_write_blocks.push_back (ibuffer);
00159                 }
00160                 for (std::vector<int>::const_iterator it =
00161                      busy_write_blocks.begin ();
00162                      it != busy_write_blocks.end (); it++)
00163                 {
00164                         ibuffer = *it;
00165                         write_reqs[ibuffer]->wait ();
00166                 }
00167                 
00168                 assert(batch_write_blocks.empty ());
00169                 free_write_blocks.clear();
00170                 busy_write_blocks.clear();
00171                 
00172                 for (unsigned i = 0; i < nwriteblocks; i++)
00173                         free_write_blocks.push_back (i);
00174         }
00175         
00177         ~buffered_writer ()
00178         {
00179                 int ibuffer;
00180                 while (!batch_write_blocks.empty ())
00181                 {
00182                         ibuffer = batch_write_blocks.top ().ibuffer;
00183                         batch_write_blocks.pop();
00184 
00185                         write_reqs[ibuffer] = write_buffers[ibuffer].write(write_bids[ibuffer]);
00186                         
00187                         busy_write_blocks.push_back (ibuffer);
00188                 }
00189                 for (std::vector<int>::const_iterator it =
00190                      busy_write_blocks.begin ();
00191                      it != busy_write_blocks.end (); it++)
00192                 {
00193                         ibuffer = *it;
00194                         write_reqs[ibuffer]->wait ();
00195                 }
00196 
00197                 delete [] write_buffers;
00198                 delete [] write_reqs;
00199                 delete [] write_bids;
00200         }
00201         
00202 };
00203

00208 #endif
